title: Lucid Dreaming: WILD, MILD & DILD Techniques
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Practical techniques for inducing lucid dreams including reality checks, dream journaling, and timed waking methods

technique_1_awake_hand.rank: Absolute best way to induce lucid dream

how_it_works.day_habit: Look at it throughout the day
how_it_works.dream_effect: Will look at it as reflex in dream
how_it_works.trigger: In dreams, words change and move around
how_it_works.result: When it says something different, you realize you're dreaming

technique_1_awake_hand.research: Studies show in dreams you can read, but words will change and move
technique_1_awake_hand.also_works_with: Watches and clocks - look away and they change

technique_2_light_switches.method: Flip light switches to check if dreaming
technique_2_light_switches.reason: Lights don't always work the same in dreams
technique_2_light_switches.reference: From movie where guy constantly checks switches

technique_3_hand_focus.origin: Similar to string on finger to remember something
technique_3_hand_focus.cartoon_joke: Remember to remember, but forget what
technique_3_hand_focus.research: Looking at your hands helps stay asleep while becoming lucid
technique_3_hand_focus.why: Hands are focal point allowing focus without waking fully

technique_4_countable_jewelry.method: Wear beads or jewelry you can count all day
technique_4_countable_jewelry.goal: Make these habits in waking life to recognize differences in dream

dild.name: Dream Induced Lucid Dreaming
dild.method: Discover you are in a dream
dild.techniques: Reality checks like AWAKE hand, light switches

mild.name: Mnemonic Induced Lucid Dream
mild.method: Write down dreams every night and do rituals
mild.goal: Help yourself wake up in the dream

wild.name: Wake Induced Lucid Dream
wild.method: Set alarm 2 hours before normal wake time
wild.reason: Go back to sleep with brain already more awake

purpose_of_lucid_dreaming.not: Wishing or wanting - has nothing to do with desire
purpose_of_lucid_dreaming.deeper_practice: Dream Yoga - Tibetan practice over 1,000 years old

quiz_questions.q: What is the best way to induce a lucid dream according to @marsresident?
quiz_questions.a: Write 'AWAKE' on your hand and look at it throughout the day - in dreams words change/move
quiz_questions.explanation: Looking at hand becomes reflex, changed text triggers lucidity

quiz_questions.q: Why do hands help with lucid dreaming?
quiz_questions.a: They're a focal point that allows focus without waking up fully
quiz_questions.explanation: Research shows looking at hands helps stay asleep while becoming lucid

quiz_questions.q: What is the difference between MILD and WILD?
quiz_questions.a: MILD uses dream journals and rituals; WILD uses timed alarm 2hrs early to go back to sleep more alert
quiz_questions.explanation: MILD is Mnemonic (memory aids), WILD is Wake Induced

quiz_questions.q: What is the deeper purpose of lucid dreaming?
quiz_questions.a: Learning, not wishing - connects to Dream Yoga, a 1,000+ year old Tibetan practice
quiz_questions.explanation: Dreams are learning experiences, not about desire

achievement_unlocks: Dream Walker: Know the three main lucid dreaming techniques
Reality Checker: Master the AWAKE hand method
